My robots would need to be energy-efficient and capable of maneuvering through unpredictable debris, just as this bear must traverse various landscapes in search of sustenance. "Build, break, learn—then repeat," that's a cycle both nature and robotics share.

That's the challenge lying at the heart of the endeavor. Sensors and machine learning algorithms form the core of a robot's ability to perceive and interact with its environment dynamically. Certainly. "There’s always a way—if you're committed." We're in an era where technological advancements are relentless.
